titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Gerald J. (Rusty) Hills papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Michigan Republican Party activist, delegate from Michigan to the Republican National Convention in 1976, later director of communication and public affairs in the John Engler administration.
archdesc.scopecontent: Miscellaneous papers pertaining to Republican Party activities and to his interest in the influence of the media in the political process.
